commands.run: docker run -d --name authelia --network {{NETWORK_NAME}} -p 9091:9091 -v /opt/homelab/authelia/config:/config -v /opt/homelab/authelia/data:/data -e AUTHELIA_JWT_SECRET=homelab-jwt-secret-change-in-production -e AUTHELIA_SESSION_SECRET=homelab-session-secret-change-in-production -e AUTHELIA_STORAGE_ENCRYPTION_KEY=homelab-encryption-key-32chars -e AUTHELIA_SESSION_REDIS_HOST=redis -e AUTHELIA_SESSION_REDIS_PORT=6379 authelia/authelia:latest
